attributes.action: STOP THE PROPOSED 'EVERYONE IS ON THE DONOR' LIST - THIS IS NOT FREEDOM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am very distressed about the proposal by the Health Secretary Alan Johnson to make everyone automatically be on the organ donor list!  This is against a persons human rights, and I, along with many other people I know, do not wish to be organ donors!  This is a total and utter intrusion of a person's life, causing uneccesary stress and unhappiness!  Please stop this NOW!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
